attributes.action: ask the London 2012 Olympic organisers to include mixed martial arts as a demonstration sport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mixed martial arts is one of the world's fastest growing sports, and the UK has had great success with fighters such as Michael Bisping, Dan Hardy, Ian Freeman, James Wilks and others making an impact at an international level.

Including MMA as a demonstration sport in the London 2012 Olympic Games would highlight Britain's continuing success in the sport and would boost levels of participation in the sport in this country.
